title: I have physics, chemistry, maths, biology, and IP in class 11. Will I be stopped from getting promoted to class 12 if I fail in chemistry? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on which school you're in. As in some cases the schools fill board examination form of that particular board by themselves. You attend all practicals in the school itself but you're not allowed to give school examinations.You are a private student in school for this case. You are asked to leave school. In this situation you have to go to the respective board office to fill your form. Your board practicals and orals take place in a college allotted to you by the board. You have to prepare your practical file and experiments by a college allotted by the board as well. Most probably schools don't fail in any condition as they try to give grace marks as much as possible …try your level best to perform very well in the last semester. All the very best!
